items.content_html: Beatbox is a lightweight TypeScript library that records and replays function calls, making it perfect for testing, mocking, and debugging. It can capture the results of expensive operations, API calls, or complex computations and play them back instantly, significantly speeding up tests and development cycles.
items.title: andrewlwn77/beatbox-recorder: Beatbox is a lightweight TypeScript library that records and replays function calls, making it perfect for testing, mocking, and debugging. It can capture the results of expensive operations, API calls, or complex computations and play them back instantly, significantly speeding up tests and development cycles.

items.content_html: use-next-sse is a lightweight and easy-to-use React hook library for implementing Server-Sent Events (SSE) in Next.js applications, enabling real-time, unidirectional data streaming from server to client.

items.content_html: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Warp and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
items.title: ljt019/exhibit_manager: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Warp and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
